name: Muddledash
description: Squidge up to four players on your couch for competitive fun (party hats are mandatory!) Join your friends on a mad-as-a-squid race to the most bopping octopus party of the year and wrestle the only present out of their wriggly tentacles. Be the first to present it at the octo-party to win!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 (32-bit) Processor: Dual Core 2.2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 3000 / GeForce 310m / Radeon HD 5450 Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: Gamepad Strongly Recommended
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: Gamepad Strongly Recommended
